column5: out on saturday and seeing the walleye didn't seem to be co-operating decided to start drop shotting the weeds edges and was rewarded with my first drop shot bucket, here's a couple shots.
That is a fat fish!  Way to go!
And a nice healthy looking fish at that!
Nice fish!  Is that a smoke slammer I see ?
thats a smoke/prl/gold fleck holographic violet fat slammer or something like that i just call them the "good ones"
Congrats! Those bass are so nice this time of the year.
Great report and pics ecmilley  Nice and fat fish.... great reward! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Looks like ya used a carrot stick.....
Thanks if wasn't for you letting me pick your brain.. can't wait to get out  I love my carrot but thinging a croix legend is going to be my next drop shot rod
Glad to help Ernie, thats the way to do it, get info and put it to the test! I'll lend you one of my blue legends , you;ll love it! The Avid is also a good rod.
wow nice bucket and great way to start building confidence with the drop-shot technique
